name: DOT Puzzle - Color Line
description:
DOT Puzzle - Color Line!!!
Amazing game it's all about concentration and being focus. Certainly a must have for puzzle lovers that is flows free. It's really awesome game mind blowing time pass game loved it. Wonderful app everyone in your family loves.
Connect the colors game ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Match colors game a try, and experience with great enjoyment!
